snippet: Police have evacuated a mall near Boston after a large crowd gathered for an event featuring a rapper and a pro basketball player....
lead_paragraph: Police have evacuated a mall near Boston after a large crowd gathered for an event featuring a rapper and a pro basketball player.

headline.main: Police Clear Mall After Crowd Gathers for Rapper, NBA Player
headline.print_headline: Police Clear Mall After Crowd Gathers for Rapper, NBA Player
